title: Deaf Education Specialist Student Teaching Practicum
description: Education specialist credential candidate performs student teaching in participating schools for a minimum of seven weeks full-time under the supervision of a cooperating teacher and university supervisor. The field experience provides professional preparation and diversified teaching responsibilities for postbaccalaureate students pursuing the California Deaf and Hard of Hearing Specialist and BCLAD Credential. Prerequisites: must be an ED76 major, Teaching and Bilingual Education (ASL-English)
